import{store}from'react-notifications-component';var successfullAdd=function successfullAdd(name){return store.addNotification({title:'Successfully Added',message:"".concat(name," was added"),type:'success',// 'default', 'success', 'info', 'warning'
container:'top-right',// where to position the notifications
animationIn:["animated","fadeIn"],// animate.css classes that's applied
animationOut:["animated","fadeOut"],// animate.css classes that's applied
dismiss:{duration:3000}});};var successfullUpdated=function successfullUpdated(name){return store.addNotification({title:'Successfully Updated',message:"".concat(name," was updated"),type:'info',// 'default', 'success', 'info', 'warning'
container:'top-right',// where to position the notifications
animationIn:["animated","fadeIn"],// animate.css classes that's applied
animationOut:["animated","fadeOut"],// animate.css classes that's applied
dismiss:{duration:3000}});};var successfullDeleted=function successfullDeleted(name){return store.addNotification({title:'Successfully Deleted',message:"".concat(name," was deleted"),type:'danger',// 'default', 'success', 'info', 'warning'
container:'top-right',// where to position the notifications
animationIn:["animated","fadeIn"],// animate.css classes that's applied
animationOut:["animated","fadeOut"],// animate.css classes that's applied
dismiss:{duration:3000}});};var error=function error(name){return store.addNotification({//title: 'Successfully Deleted',
message:"Information of ".concat(name," has already been removed from server"),type:'danger',// 'default', 'success', 'info', 'warning'
container:'top-center',// where to position the notifications
animationIn:["animated","fadeIn"],// animate.css classes that's applied
animationOut:["animated","fadeOut"],// animate.css classes that's applied
dismiss:{duration:3000}});};var unique=function unique(text){return store.addNotification({//title: 'Successfully Deleted',
message:"".concat(text),type:'danger',// 'default', 'success', 'info', 'warning'
container:'top-center',// where to position the notifications
animationIn:["animated","fadeIn"],// animate.css classes that's applied
animationOut:["animated","fadeOut"],// animate.css classes that's applied
dismiss:{duration:3000}});};export default{successfullAdd:successfullAdd,successfullUpdated:successfullUpdated,successfullDeleted:successfullDeleted,error:error,unique:unique};
